subject: SSN5992
description_text:
Hello, i ordered the Plus X Pedals on the 11th Jan. with Express Shipping (#
SSN5992)
but it seems that my package does a roadtrip through whole china^^ its not
a problem but can u tell me round about when its gonna be delivered? Its a
bit annoying that i paid for express and its not gonna be fulfilled, but
its okay i just wanna know when my package will be delivered round about.

Best regards and thank you
